notifications.invalidServer_text: Podany adres serwera nie jest prawidłowy

welcome1.title: WITAMY
welcome1.text2: Kilka następnych minut spędzimy na Konfiguracji portfela.
welcome1.reminder: Możesz ulec pokusie, aby pominąć pewne kroki, ale radzimy przejść przez cały proces.

welcome2.title: USTAWIENIA PORTFELA
welcome2.text2: Czy posiadasz już seed'a, którego chciałbyś użyć?
welcome2.seed_explanation1: Seed jest jakby głównym hasłem do twojego konta.
welcome2.seed_explanation2: Można go używać, aby uzyskać dostęp do swoich środków z dowolnego portfela, na dowolnym urządzeniu. Jeśli stracisz swojego seed'a, stracisz swoje IOTA
welcome2.reminder: Proszę dbaj o bezpieczeństwo swojego seed'a

lightserver.title: INSTALATOR LIGHT SERVER
lightserver.text1: A light server is a gateway to the IOTA network, kindly provided by members of the community or our corporate partners.
lightserver.text2: You can find out more information about the servers at: http://iotasupport.com/lightwallet.shtml
lightserver.text3: Please choose a server from the list below.

enterSeed.title: WPROWADŹ SWOJEGO SEED'A
enterSeed.error_text: Seeds must be at least 60 characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seed_explanation: Seeds should be 81 characters long and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than 81 characters.
enterSeed.reminder: NEVER SHARE YOUR SEED WITH ANYONE

newSeedSetup.title: WYGENERUJ NOWEGO SEED'A
newSeedSetup.text1: Press individual letters to randomise them.

saveYourSeed.title: ZAPISZ SWOJEGO SEED'A
saveYourSeed.text1: You must save your seed with at least one of the options listed below.

saveYourSeed2.title: SAVE YOUR SEED
saveYourSeed2.explanation: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and triple check they are correct.

saveYourSeed3.title: SAVE YOUR SEED
saveYourSeed3.explanation: Click the button below to copy your seed to a password manager. It will stay in your clipboard for 60 seconds.
saveYourSeed3.text: Do not store the seed in plain text.

setPassword.title: PASSWORD SETUP
setPassword.text: Okay, now we need to set up a password.
setPassword.explanation: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored in your keychain. You will then only need to type in your password to access your wallet.
setPassword.reminder: Ensure you use a strong password.
setPassword.error1_text: Your password must be at least 8 characters. Please try again.
setPassword.error2_text: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.
